title: How to Turn Off Mcafee Endpoint Security

steps.title: Right-click the McAfee system tray icon.
steps.content: Right-click the McAfee system tray icon. There's an icon in your start menu or there's an icon down by the clock. The icon looks like a red shield. [1] X Expert Source Luigi Oppido Computer & Tech Specialist Expert Interview. 30 September 2021.

steps.title: Click Disable Endpoint Security Firewall.
steps.content: Click Disable Endpoint Security Firewall . [2] X Expert Source Luigi Oppido Computer & Tech Specialist Expert Interview. 30 September 2021. If you already have the firewall disabled, you will not see this option.

steps.title: Answer the prompt (if applicable).
steps.content: Answer the prompt (if applicable). You might need to tell your computer administrator why you disabled the firewall.

steps.title: Click the McAfee shield on the status bar.
steps.content: Click the McAfee shield on the status bar. [3] X Expert Source Luigi Oppido Computer & Tech Specialist Expert Interview. 30 September 2021. This icon looks like a red shield.

steps.title: Click Preferences.
steps.content: Click Preferences . This will prompt a Preferences window to pop up.

steps.title: Click the lock icon on the General tab.
steps.content: Click the lock icon on the General tab. The General tab should be the default tab to open, but if not, click it to open it. Then you'll be able to click the lock icon.

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. To make these changes, you'll need to be able to enter the administrative password for your computer.

steps.title: Click to disable the firewall.
steps.content: Click to disable the firewall. Once you disable the firewall, you can click the lock icon (which appears unlocked) to save your changes.
